languages.text: {n}Загадочное существо, так долго бывшее душой вашего корабля, оборачивается к вам.{/n} "Но это ты, {name}, по-настоящему привел{mf||а} нас в этот мир. Так давай встретим нашего чудовищного предтечу вместе. Ибо он готов вырваться".

{n}The mysterious creature that has been your ship's soul for so long turns to face you.{/n} "But it is you, {name}, who truly ushered us into this world. So let us meet our abominable precursor together. For it is ready to break free."
languages.original_text: {n}Загадочное существо, так долго бывшее душой вашего корабля, оборачивается к вам.{/n} "Но это ты, {name}, по-настоящему привел{mf||а} нас в этот мир. Так давай встретим нашего чудовищного предтечу вместе. Ибо он готов вырваться".

traits.locale_text: {n}The mysterious creature that had been your ship's soul for so long, turns to face you.{/n} "But it is you, {name}, who actually brought us into this world. So let us meet our monstrous forerunner together. He is ready to break out."

{n}The mysterious creature that had been your ship's soul for so long, turns to face you.{/n} "But it is you, {name}, who actually brought us into this world. So let us meet our monstrous forerunner together. He is ready to break out."

{n}The mysterious creature that has been your ship's soul for so long, turns to face you.{/n} "But it is you, {name}, who actually ushered us into this world. So let us meet our monstrous forerunner together, shall we? For he is ready to burst out."

{n}The mysterious creature that has been your ship's soul for so long, turns to face you.{/n} "But it is you, {name}, who actually ushered us into this world. So let us meet our monstrous forerunner together, shall we? For he is ready to burst out."

{n}The mysterious creature that has been your ship's soul for so long turns to face you.{/n} "But it is you, {name}, who truly ushered us into this world. So let us meet our abominable precursor together. For it is ready to break free."

{n}The mysterious creature that has been your ship's soul for so long turns to face you.{/n} "But it is you, {name}, who truly ushered us into this world. So let us meet our abominable precursor together. For it is ready to break free."

languages.text: {n}La créature mystérieuse qui a si longtemps été l'âme de votre vaisseau se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Mais c'est vous, {name}, qui nous avez permis de nous manifester dans ce monde. Alors, rencontrons ensemble notre abominable précurseur ! Car il est sur le point de se libérer. »
languages.original_text: {n}The mysterious creature that has been your ship's soul for so long turns to face you.{/n} "But it is you, {name}, who truly ushered us into this world. So let us meet our abominable precursor together. For it is ready to break free."

traits.locale_text: {n}La créature mystérieuse qui est l'âme de votre vaisseau depuis si longtemps se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Mais c'est vous, {name}, qui nous avez permis de nous manifester dans ce monde. Alors rencontrons ensemble notre monstrueux précurseur, d'accord ? Car il est sur le point de surgir. »

languages.text: {n}La misteriosa criatura que ha sido el alma de tu nave durante tanto tiempo se gira para mirarte.{/n} «Pero es usted, {name}, {mf|el|la} verdader{mf|o|a} responsable de traernos a este mundo. Vayamos al encuentro de nuestro espantoso precursor. Porque está a punto de escapar».
languages.original_text: {n}The mysterious creature that has been your ship's soul for so long turns to face you.{/n} "But it is you, {name}, who truly ushered us into this world. So let us meet our abominable precursor together. For it is ready to break free."

traits.locale_text: {n}La misteriosa criatura que ha sido el alma de tu nave durante tanto tiempo se gira para mirarte.{/n} «Pero es usted, {name}, {mf|el|la} responsable de traernos a este mundo. ¿Le parece que nos veamos las caras con nuestro precursor? Porque está a punto de estallar».

languages.text: {n}这只神秘生物，你的飞船一直以来的灵魂，此刻转过了身，看着你。{/n}“但实际上，{name}，是你真正地将我们带到了这个世界。我们一起去见见我们那位可怕的先驱吧，因为他已经要冲破牢笼了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The mysterious creature that has been your ship's soul for so long turns to face you.{/n} "But it is you, {name}, who truly ushered us into this world. So let us meet our abominable precursor together. For it is ready to break free."

traits.locale_text: {n}这只神秘生物，你的飞船一直以来的灵魂，此刻转过了身，看着你。{/n}“但实际上，{name}，是你将我们带到了这个世界。我们一起去见见我们那位可怕的先驱，好吗？因为他已经要爆炸了。”

languages.text: {n}Die mysteriöse Kreatur, die so lange die Seele deines Schiffs war, wendet sich zu dir.{/n} "Aber Ihr wart es, {name}, {mf|der|die} uns wirklich in diese Welt geholt hat. Also treten wir unserem abscheulichen Vorläufer gemeinsam gegenüber, ja? Denn er ist bereit zum Ausbruch."
languages.original_text: {n}The mysterious creature that has been your ship's soul for so long turns to face you.{/n} "But it is you, {name}, who truly ushered us into this world. So let us meet our abominable precursor together. For it is ready to break free."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die mysteriöse Kreatur, die so lange die Seele deines Schiffs war, wendet sich zu dir.{/n} "Aber Ihr wart es, {name}, {mf|der|die} uns in diese Welt geholt hat. Also treten wir unserem monströsen Vorläufer gemeinsam gegenüber, ja? Denn er ist bereit, herauszuplatzen."

languages.text: {n}長きにわたってあなたの船の魂であった謎の生物が、あなたと対峙している。{/n}「だが、我々をこの世界へと導いたのはお前だ、{name}。ゆえに、我らと共に忌々しい先駆者を迎えよう。奴は今にも飛び出してくる」
languages.original_text: {n}The mysterious creature that has been your ship's soul for so long turns to face you.{/n} "But it is you, {name}, who truly ushered us into this world. So let us meet our abominable precursor together. For it is ready to break free."

traits.locale_text: {n}長きにわたってあなたの船の魂であった謎の生物が、あなたと対峙している。{/n}「だが、我々をこの世界へと導いたのはお前だ、{name}。ゆえに、我らと共に忌々しい先駆者を迎えよう。奴は今にも飛び出してくる」

languages.text: {n}Uzun zaman boyunca geminin ruhunda yaşayan gizemli yaratık, dönüp sana bakıyor.{/n} "Fakat bize bu dünyaya kadar eşlik eden sendin {name}. Gel, felaketimizin habercisiyle birlikte tanışalım. Artık serbest kalmaya hazır."
languages.original_text: {n}The mysterious creature that has been your ship's soul for so long turns to face you.{/n} "But it is you, {name}, who truly ushered us into this world. So let us meet our abominable precursor together. For it is ready to break free."
